titles.title: Food Assistance to Improve Reintegration Act of 2009
To amend the Personal Responsibility and Work Opportunity Reconciliation Act of 1996 to repeal the denial of food stamp eligibility of ex-offenders.
Food Assistance to Improve Reintegration Act of 2009

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry.

committee.name: House Agriculture
committee.subcommittee: Commodity Markets, Digital Assets, and Rural Development

bill.summary: Food Assistance to Improve Reintegration Act of 2009 - Amends the Personal Responsibility and Work Opportunity Reconciliation Act of 1996 to repeal the denial of food stamp eligibility for a person convicted of a felony which has as an element the possession, use, or distribution of a controlled substance.
